Linear Mixed Model for Tumor Growth Data

Source: R/lmm.R
lmm.Rd

Linear Mixed Model for Tumor Growth Data

Usage

lmm(
  data,
  tumr_obj = NULL,
  formula = NULL,
  id = NULL,
  time = NULL,
  measure = NULL,
  group = NULL
)

Arguments

data

tumor growth data

tumr_obj

takes tumr_obj created by tumr()

formula

linear mixed model formula

id

Column of subject ID's

time

Column of repeated time measurements

measure

Column of repeated measurements of tumor

group

Column specifying the treatment group for each measurement

Value

summary of linear mixed model fit

Examples

data(melanoma1)
meta_data <- tumr(ID, Day, Volume, Treatment)
lmm(
data = melanoma1,
tumr_obj = meta_data
)
#> Linear mixed model fit by REML ['lmerMod']
#> Formula: Volume ~ Treatment + Day + (1 | ID)
#>    Data: data
#> 
#> REML criterion at convergence: 8740.8
#> 
#> Scaled residuals: 
#>     Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
#> -1.4990 -0.5199 -0.1879  0.2711  7.0893 
#> 
#> Random effects:
#>  Groups   Name        Variance Std.Dev.
#>  ID       (Intercept)  18139   134.7   
#>  Residual             124734   353.2   
#> Number of obs: 600, groups:  ID, 35
#> 
#> Fixed effects:
#>              Estimate Std. Error t value
#> (Intercept)  456.2534    58.8662   7.751
#> TreatmentB  -524.8697    78.3362  -6.700
#> TreatmentC  -148.6094    81.2940  -1.828
#> TreatmentD  -681.5280    80.3381  -8.483
#> Day            3.7457     0.4345   8.621
#> 
#> Correlation of Fixed Effects:
#>            (Intr) TrtmnB TrtmnC TrtmnD
#> TreatmentB -0.681                     
#> TreatmentC -0.687  0.523              
#> TreatmentD -0.659  0.558  0.510       
#> Day        -0.213 -0.170 -0.019 -0.192

lmm(
data = melanoma2,
tumr_obj = meta_data,
formula = "Volume ~ Day + (1 | ID)"
)
#> Linear mixed model fit by REML ['lmerMod']
#> Formula: Volume ~ Day + (1 | ID)
#>    Data: data
#> 
#> REML criterion at convergence: 8271.4
#> 
#> Scaled residuals: 
#>     Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
#> -2.4943 -0.5851 -0.1894  0.3945  3.1729 
#> 
#> Random effects:
#>  Groups   Name        Variance Std.Dev.
#>  ID       (Intercept)  77726   278.8   
#>  Residual             104816   323.8   
#> Number of obs: 568, groups:  ID, 47
#> 
#> Fixed effects:
#>             Estimate Std. Error t value
#> (Intercept) 150.8564    47.2411   3.193
#> Day          11.5321     0.6492  17.765
#> 
#> Correlation of Fixed Effects:
#>     (Intr)
#> Day -0.408

data(breast)
lmm(
data = breast,
id = "ID",
group = "Treatment",
time = "Week",
measure = "Volume"
)
#> Linear mixed model fit by REML ['lmerMod']
#> Formula: Volume ~ Treatment + Week + (1 | ID)
#>    Data: data
#> 
#> REML criterion at convergence: 6939.5
#> 
#> Scaled residuals: 
#>     Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max 
#> -1.9538 -0.4906 -0.1252  0.2558 10.3047 
#> 
#> Random effects:
#>  Groups   Name        Variance  Std.Dev.
#>  ID       (Intercept)  48183630  6941   
#>  Residual             169051234 13002   
#> Number of obs: 319, groups:  ID, 28
#> 
#> Fixed effects:
#>              Estimate Std. Error t value
#> (Intercept)  -6047.95    2527.58  -2.393
#> TreatmentVEH    35.49    3003.37   0.012
#> Week          1909.65     218.96   8.722
#> 
#> Correlation of Fixed Effects:
#>             (Intr) TrtVEH
#> TreatmntVEH -0.598       
#> Week        -0.545  0.012
